title: Kimchi Potato Pancakes
ingredients: 3pounds (1.4kg) Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and shredded
Crème fraîche and sliced scallions, for serving
directions: 1) Combine all ingredients except crème fraîche and scallions in a mixing bowl.

3) Press pancake mixture onto parchment-lined rimmed baking sheets. Bake for 20 minutes and punch out rounds using 3-inch ring molds. For less waste, cut baked potato mixture into squares instead of rings.
4) Heat a sauté pan over medium-high heat, drizzle with oil, and sear both sides of each pancake until crisp. To serve, top each pancake with crème fraîche, sliced scallions, and Korean chili flakes.
